aka: Todos quieren ser el próximo Weismann
this_title: Everyone wants to be the next Weismann
trans_title: 谁都想当下一个卫斯曼
Todos quieren ser el próximo Weismann
introduction: Martín Solo, an unorthodox art curator, is about to open his private museum to the public with a major exhibition. In the past he experienced the sour taste of failure, but this time he's prepared to lay all his cards on the table.
chinese_title: 谁都想当下一个卫斯曼
foreign_title: Everyone wants to be the next Weismann
